class MyClass {
public static myValue: string;
constructor(init: string) {
this.myValue = init;
}

import fs = require("fs");
module MyModule {
export interface MyInterface extends Other {

}
}
declare magicNumber number;
myArray.forEach(() => { }); // fat arrow syntax`
